  • Field Details

    • terminal

      private final com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.Terminal terminal
      The terminal to be used for the textual user interface. The type of terminal determines the operations that are supported by it.

    • screen

      private final com.googlecode.lanterna.screen.Screen screen
      A screen buffer on top of the terminal that reduces unnecessary redrawing and wastage of CPU cycles.

    • textGUI

      private final com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.MultiWindowTextGUI textGUI

    • window

      private final com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.Window window
      The main window inside which all other components live.

    • network

      private final Network network
      The network is the backbone of the entire program. It stores the state of the program at any given point, and contains all the entities, order histories, etc.

    • programPanels

      final Map<panelList,com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.Panel> programPanels
      A map that maps a set of enumerated constants to a set of panels that are embedded inside the main window. This helps in programmatically accessing the various parts of the TUI.

    • createAllPanels

      private void createAllPanels()
      A single utility method to create all the required panels and map them to their respective enumerated constants in panelList.
